title: Kindred Spotify Playlist

embed.description: NOTE: add "Ulalume" by Jeff Buckley here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G54Xqyx0Tbo

body:
Hey guys, 

I posted this over on Reddit and wanted to share here. There were some folk interested in hearing the playlists I listened to while working on different champions. This is the one I did for Kindred, which was the most requested. 

There is -- with ONE glaring omission. It's not on spotify, or available anywhere but youtube. 

It's Jeff Buckley reciting Edgar Allan Poe's "Ulalume" to sweet music. Here's the youtube link: add it to your own playlist. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G54Xqyx0Tbo

Annnnnd, here's the Kindred spotify playlist. 

https://open.spotify.com/user/fauxschizzle/playlist/6IJbAQAlnPsL3Ex6x3cyWz

(in no particular order) 

1.	Jeff Buckley – Ulalume
2.	Brand New – Jesus Christ
3.	Idol Fodder – Death and the Maiden
4.	Two Sheds – Psycho Killer
5.	Jeff Buckley – Satisfied Mind
6.	The Naked and Famous – the Sun
7.	Bleachers (f. Yoko Ono) – I’m Ready to Move On/Wild Heart Reprise
8.	Manchester Orchestra – Where Have You Been?
9.	Simon & Garfunkel – The Sound of Silence
10.	Deathcab for Cutie – A Lack of Color
11.	Nirvana – Where Did You Sleep Last Night?
12.	Stars – Celebration Guns
13.	Now, Now – the Pull
14.	Brand New – Out of Range
15.	Alt-J – Every Other Freckle
16.	Makeup and Vanity Set – Don’t Wait for Me
17.	Sunn 0))) - Sin Nanna
18.	Sunn 0))) – Candle Goat
19.	Timbre Timbre – Magic Arrow
20.	The Dears – Omega Dog
21.	Beats Antique – Bloody Bones 
22.	Massive Attack – Paradise Circus
23.	Tom Waits – A Little Drop of Poison
24.	Ceremony of Passage – Vas
25.	Venus in Furs – Christian Death
26.	Massive Attack – Angel
27.	Magnet – Maypole
28.	Magnet – Fire Leap
29.	Magnet – Sunset
30.	Arcade Fire – My Body is a Cage
31.	Bat for Lashes – What’s a Girl to Do?
32.	Angelo Badalamenti – Red Bats With Teeth
33.	Marilyn Manson – Apple of Sodom
34.	Morrissey – The More You Ignore Me, the Closer I Get 
35.	The Doors – Riders on the Storm

replies.body:
Cool can you get back to work on Kindred at some point?

Seriously she is not in a good place right now.

> [{quoted}](name=Just Kitten,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rxzko0ME,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2017-08-26T06:40:47.514+0000)
>
> They're* TRIGGERED

mb mb you're right
How can you blame him tho? When you play Kindred it's just like playing a lamb with her irrelevant pet
Slightly related. Do you or other Rioters have unofficial theme songs that you tend to associate with each Champion or faction?
I'm always down sample musical sources of inspiration.

> [{quoted}](name=A Superb Villain,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rxzko0ME,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-08-26T00:52:22.762+0000)
>
> I'm always down sample musical sources of inspiration.

I'll be posting the Ekko one next!
Makes me wonder what Mordekaiser's playlist is going to look like once you guys get around working on his VGU^^
Massive Attack, Death Cab, these are some awesome picks. I'm saveing this thread for future use. I don't care If I physically cant play Kindred, i'm going to play em anyway.
How far back do these playlists go? Will we see "playlist: Udyr" all the way in the back?

> [{quoted}](name=CaptainMårvelous,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rxzko0ME,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-08-27T22:04:17.351+0000)
>
> How far back do these playlists go? Will we see "playlist: Udyr" all the way in the back?

I can only speak for the champions that I've worked on, as music helps me get into the mindset of the champion and their viewpoint on the world/corner of Runeterra.  

I have playlists for Ekko, Kindred, Aurelion Sol, Ivern, Xayah, and Ornn.

What about Bard?
Did he listen to sweet trumpet solos?
Arcade Fire? From Neon Bible no less? I approve.
